OOC: I think they've been asleep long enough eh?

::Firaxis::
       He awoke to a resounding thud.  He wasn't sure exactly what that thud 
was or why he was asleep but he was pretty sure it had to do with excess 
energon, Meteara, and a certain sphere.  He looks around and eventually 
crawls over to Meteara.  "Ma'am, something seems to have fallen more or less 
on our heads.  As disturbing as this is, it seems like we should check it 
out.  In fact I'm going to do that."  He taps some controls on his arm and 
Horn walks over groggily. "Whaddya want?"  Firaxis was more than a little 
confused.  "You can talk?"  Horn looks at him apathetically.  "It certainly 
seems that way now doesn't it.  I suppose you want to investigate that thud 
we just heard."  Firaxis nods dumbfounded.  "Well lets go then,  oopsI 
forgot, master."  Firaxis shakes his head and they head back to the surface 
to investigate the third Artifact also known as Thud.

--part1_a1.2bc84725.2a89fb1c_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
